name: rhino.fi
introduce: rhino.fi is a decentralized layer2 exchange protocol, where users can swap, send and invest, all from one easy to use platform, without paying Ethereum network fees. rhino.fi aims to be a multi-chain DeFi hub provides all the best opportunities in the DeFi realm: swaps, yield, staking and trading. . DeversiFi was initially incubated by Bitfinex.
